com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket
An implementation of the Token bucket algorithm.

    Sets the maximum amount of tokens that the bucket may hold before overflowing.
    Limit.Builder

    Indicates how often tokensPerPeriod should be added to the bucket.

    Sets the number of tokens that are refilled at a time.
    Limit.Builder

    Sets the amount of tokens to add to the bucket every period.
